      • maxIdx

        public static int maxIdx(double[] x)
        Deprecated. 
        Find index of maximum element in the vector x
        Parameters:
        x - input vector
        Returns:
        index of the maximum element. Index of the first maximum element is returned if multiple maximums are found.
